text: the devops course is meant to introduce
students to the DevOps practice the
DevOps methodology what is it what tools
are incorporated it's really the concept
of people process and technology I think
my favorite module for this course is
infrastructure is code it's designed
it's focused heavily on cloud formation
which is a tool that enables users to
deploy provision and maintain their
quote/unquote infrastructure on AWS I
have about 18 months of formal training
experience prior to that about 16 years
in the IT industry most recently working
as a DevOps engineer helping customers
implement and mature their DevOps
practices so I had a great level of
exposure to how to do things right and
how do not do things so well so some
great learning opportunities and that's
experience that I bring to the classroom
with me to help students to fully
understand the DevOps practice
